attributes.action: BUILD A  SECURE FACILITY TO DETAIN ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All illegal entrants to the UK to be held in a purpose built secure facility in a remote part of the UK until deportation. All illegal immigrants to be charged with violating soveriegn borders and the Foreign Office to make this clear to the world that unlawful entry to the UK is no longer acceptable
